data.name: CONNECTION LOST
data.detailed_description:
The drug infused man will stop at nothing to reach the top of building in order to get network connection in his phone . Use your phone as a weapon in a cartoony mysterious world and fire up all your enemies with a powerful flame thrower.

storyline

Experience a captivating single player story packed with action and intentive twists .Play as a drug infused man Wraith, who experiences some unusual changes in his strength and fights his way to the top of building just to get connection in his phone .

combat Experience

CONNECTION LOST gives players an adrenaline fueled combat experience. Take the fast-paced , first person action to the next level with unique weapons and deadlier abilities. Make your way to the top of building filled with mysteries , adventures and diverse enemies . combat ans battle those standing in your way to achieve your goal using variety of unique weapons .

Unique Weapons

The weapons you'll use in the game are pretty unique . The phone will be used as a weapon and also at some places for solving puzzles . You'll also be repairing and upgrading the phone with in game currency .You can use flamethrower in situations where phone is less effective .
